thread.title: 'At least two dead' after avalanche at French ski resort in Tignes
thread.title_full: 'At least two dead' after avalanche at French ski resort in Tignes

author: David Chazan
title: 'At least two dead' after avalanche at French ski resort in Tignes
text:
'At least two dead' after avalanche at French ski resort in Tignes 13 February 2017 • 11:56am David Chazan , Paris 13 February 2017 • 11:56am 
A t least two people have been killed in an avalanche near the French ski resort of Tignes, according to local media reports. 
More to follow.
